replies.message: My story was when you came out with not afraid. And this is my deceased bf Jesse (My angel) so We were getting methadone  185mg daily and xanax 4xs. Yes horrible. Well I quit cold turkey cuz I found out Hitler had something to do with the creation. (True Story) Thats when that song came out 2012 rt? After Jess shot himself your Space bound song was a perfect fit! like all your songs .. Cuz YOU tell it like it is! Hard to hear sometimes but .. Im a trooper..
